Title: Rumors
Plot: Lizzie tries out for cheerleader but doesn't do very well. Later that night she and Miranda chat online. Lizzie jokes that Kate made the squad because she stuffs her bra. Miranda accidentally sends out the message to everyone on the class roster. The next day at school Kate is furious about the taunting she's receiving and confronts Lizzie and Miranda, demanding to know who is responsible. GuestStars: Byron Fox, Taylor Gunnin, Mitchah Williams, Britney Mitchell, Melissa Matthews, Tiffany Burton
